2.caption_en:
Blank Network Effects Stimulation worksheet (Platform Innovation Kit v5.0) for mapping stakeholders, value propositions, relevance and stimulation activities across cross-side, core, and same-side relationships. The template includes checkboxes for relevance (High/Mid/Low), colored core areas, and PIK branding with a download link in the footer.
